name: La Patrulla Mágica Interestelar
description:
We're the Loc Fandango localization team, straight from Spain! Right now, the team is composed of the following people:

Jaume Carrascosa (Graphics)

Belén Diéguez (Voice for Maxilla)

Eduardo Facal (Translation, reviewing)

Xabier Gómez (Programmer, voice for Maldrek, voice director)

Aurora Grandal (Translation, voice for Doorian)

Nicolás Marín (Voice for Flat Guy and Merchant)

Alexandra Martínez (Testing)

Antonio Pastor (Voice for Prince Xandar)

Celia Rocha-Táboas (Translation, testing, voice for Maria)
